caption.p: Distribution of ( a) the observed SST anomaly (detrended component) in August/September 2017 and ( b) the reconstructed SST anomaly by combined impacts of the ENSO, the AMM, and the NAO. Green boxes denote the eastern Main Development Region (EMDR). ( c) Six bars in the graph in the right panel represent the SST anomaly over the EMDR by total, long-term linear trend, climate variation (i.e., departure from long-term linear trend), ENSO impact, AMM impact, and the NAO impact, respectively.
